  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static UserManager getInstance()
      The instance of the UserManager class is only created when it is required.

    • getCurrentUser

      public java.util.Optional<User> getCurrentUser()

    • signUp

      public void signUp​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException, DuplicateUsernameException, EmptyFieldsException
      Creates a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - = the username of the user
      password - = the password set by the user
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - = in case the user could not be saved
      DuplicateUsernameException
      EmptyFieldsException

    • signIn

      public boolean signIn​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException, EmptyFieldsException
      Validates the sign-in, by searching for the username in the database, then comparing the corresponding password with the one introduced by the user, and it sets the currentUser on successful sign-in, otherwise currentUser will be null.
      Parameters:
      username - = username introduced by the user at sign-in
      password - = password introduced by the user at sign-in
      Returns:
      boolean = true if the username and password were found in the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if a database error occurred
      EmptyFieldsException - if a user didn't introduce all the required data when signing in

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String password)
      Validates the password introduced by the user when attempting to change the password. This is an additional security step, to protect the account information of the user.
      Parameters:
      password - = password introduced by the user that will be compared to the current password
      Returns:
      boolean = true if the password matches

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException, NoSignedInUserException, DuplicateUsernameException, EmptyFieldsException
      Updates the user's account information, saving the new username and password. Whenever the user changes the account data from the settings view, the currentUser instance is updated as well.
      Parameters:
      username - = new username
      password - = new password
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      NoSignedInUserException
      DuplicateUsernameException
      EmptyFieldsException

    • getUserById

      @Nullable public @Nullable User getUserById​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Finds and returns the user with the specified id from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      the user with the given id.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the data could not be retrieved from the database.

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
